content: Wow our material today is going to start at an unlikely place and this is a
playground and you can see we have these wood chips here and they're nicely aged
and broken up and all this kind of thing so grab a handful and take them back to
your workshop and I'll show you what I did with them oh no monsters left to me
monsters to the right of me what's Ronaldo to do
calm down Ronaldo all right here's a monster I use this oh no it's a Star
Wars mini but I made them into a forest monster and I know these wood chips to
it and look how great that looks I just flew those right to the base added some
flocking and it looks like a nice forest creature tearing through the the woods
and here's a forest troll I did with a similar technique I just used the wood
chips and put them on the base and they really look great it really add to the
figure I think so there you go your tax dollars at work and for crafting hey you
yeah you back here huh I know it was short what do you expect it was a short
tip watching on our episodes if you want Jesus quit bugging me hey and make sure
you join the forum too much for that oh yeah and have a magical craptastic
